p: After that, in early 2017, the B3 genotype was consistently introduced in Sicily, being primarily represented by MVs identical to the “Kansas” WHO named strain within the Northwestern area and then rapidly spreading toward the Eastern part of the region. Finally, the “Dublin” (MVs/Dublin.IRL/8.16) named strain circulated in Sicily, clearly delineated the current measles outbreak of endemic cases and, as of 31 August 2017, 145 MVs have been identified; almost all (95.2%; n = 138/145) were 100% identical to this WHO named strain, while a unique sequence (MVs/Catania.ITA/27.17/2) fell outside the main cluster (unnamed variant).
